summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by changing the AvoidButton label to "think about it". However, REQ-2 (redeploy) is not evidenced in the diff. The diff also includes unrequested changes/additions, including a backend file modification (despite the constraint to keep backend as-is) and updates to an Internet Identity hook plus project metadata files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Rebuild and redeploy the updated frontend so the user can view/share the updated live version.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows source file changes; it does not include any deployment/release configuration changes or evidence of a new build/deployed version being produced.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend file modified even though the request specified UI-only changes and to keep the backend as-is.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint explicitly says no backend changes are required; diff shows a modification in backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to Internet Identity authentication hook (unrelated to updating the "No" label).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a UI label change on the Valentine question screen; modifying auth/login hook is outside scope and risks unintended behavior changes.
Not requested by BuildRequest; does not directly implement the UI label change or redeploy requirement.
